QuestData.Title: Crush the Witherbark
QuestData.Description: The Witherbark trolls and Boulderfist ogres of Arathi are working together to rid us from this land, but we shall not meet our fates at their, or anyone else's, hand. We will slay them and show them that we, too, have a home here. $B$BThe trolls turned their backs to us; the ogres would use us for food and bedding if we allowed them to--these things shall not be.$B$BWe start our attack on the Witherbark trolls to the south of here. Slay them in droves, and only return when their camps run thick with blood.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 10 Witherbark Axe Throwers, 10 Headhunters and 8 Witch Doctors.
QuestData.CompletionText: Haven't completed my task yet? Are you scared, coward?
QuestData.RewardText: The signs of war are upon your garments, and sweat drips from your brow. Good, very good indeed.
